valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 28 Dec 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 29 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low Trafalgar 1002 expected east of Gibraltar 1015 by 0600 tomorrow. High Fair Isle 1040 dissipating

Northwest 4 or 5, veering north 5 to 7.

Rough, occasionally very rough later.
Weather
Showers, wintry later.
Visibility
Good, occasionally moderate later.
